description:
Franky and Iceberg stay up all night on a mission to finish a new ship for the Straw Hats, but the first light of day brings troubling news!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Everyone Finally Has a Bounty! A Pirate Group Worth Over 600 Million!
Tout le monde est enfin mis à prix ! L’équipage qui dépasse les 600 millions !
Tsui ni Zen`in Shoukin Kubi! 6-okugoe no Ichimi!
Все в розыске! Команда, стоящая больше 600.000.000!
ついに全員賞金首! 6億越えの一味!
